summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account from February 1 to February 28, 2014. It includes information on account balances, deposits, transfers, and service charges, highlighting significant financial activity during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $250,000.00 was made into Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $250,000.00 was made out of Jeffrey Epstein's account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for February 2014.
The beginning balance on February 1, 2014, was $10,699.94.
A total of $250,000.00 was deposited into the account on February 24, 2014.
A total of $250,000.00 was transferred out of the account on February 28, 2014.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
